hero.name: Gonzalo Lobos
hero.title: Business Engineer Specializing in E-commerce and Web Development.
hero.subtitle: I turn business strategies into digital experiences that drive growth and conversion.

about.title: About Me
about.imageAlt: Portrait of Gonzalo Lobos, E-commerce and Web Development Specialist
about.introduction: I'm a Business Engineer from UAI, passionate about building bridges between business strategy and technology. My experience in the dynamic world of e-commerce, especially leading initiatives for a global brand like Nespresso, has taught me that the best digital solutions are born from a deep understanding of the customer and business goals. It's not just about selling online, but about creating memorable user experiences that drive conversion and foster loyalty.
about.skills: My approach is data-driven. I use tools like Google Analytics to gain insights and turn them into action, optimizing every touchpoint of the sales funnel. This analytical vision is complemented by my experience in front-end development, which allows me not only to design the strategy but also to prototype, validate ideas, and collaborate effectively with technical teams to ensure the vision is executed with precision and quality. This portfolio, built by me from scratch with React, is an example of that passion for technical execution.
about.callToAction: I'm looking to connect with innovative teams where I can contribute this hybrid vision to create exceptional digital products. If my profile resonates with you, let's talk.

items.title: Expansis - Digital Solutions
items.description: Development and consulting of custom digital solutions to boost online businesses, covering web development, digital marketing, and SEO strategies.

items.title: Lobos Mini Excavators
items.description: Website for a mini excavator rental company, focused on excavations and earthmoving in confined spaces in the Aconcagua Valley.

items.title: My Personal Portfolio
items.description: Design and development of my own professional portfolio website. Built from scratch with React and Tailwind CSS, and deployed with Firebase.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: A selection of my most recent achievements and projects.

items.title: Strategic Campaign Management on Web and App
items.problem: The need to maintain a dynamic commercial calendar and run multiple campaigns simultaneously on the web and mobile app to drive sales and customer interaction.
items.objective: To orchestrate and execute over 30 commercial campaigns throughout the year, ensuring a consistent and high-quality user experience across all digital touchpoints.
actions: Planning and execution of an annual calendar with over 30 campaigns on the web and mobile app.
Coordination with design, development, and marketing teams to ensure the correct implementation of each campaign.
Constant monitoring of campaign performance to optimize results in real-time.
results: Significant impact on sales volume, with an estimated over 8.4 million product units moved through these campaigns.
Improvement in purchase frequency and user interaction with the brand on digital channels.

items.title: Increase in Order Share through SEO
items.problem: The organic channel represented only 9% of total orders, indicating a growth opportunity to reduce dependency on paid media.
items.objective: To increase the share of organic orders from 9% to 13% during the first half of 2025.
actions: Improvement and optimization of the main business keywords.
Integration of new long-tail keywords identified with Semrush and Google Keyword Planner.
Implementation of FAQ sections on product detail pages (PDP) and product listing pages (PLP).
Implementation of structured data (Schema) to improve visibility in search results.
results: 4% increase in the share of organic orders (from 9% to 13%).

items.title: Enhancement of Pickup and Self-Service Channels
items.problem: There was an opportunity to improve the omnichannel experience and reduce the operational load on the customer support team.
items.objective: To strengthen the in-store pickup system and effectively communicate self-service tools to customers.
actions: I optimized the purchase flow for the pickup modality, resulting in a smoother experience.
Communication was improved, inviting customers to live the boutique experience.
Finally, transactional emails were optimized to speed up order pickup, thus reducing their in-store dwell time.
results: 15% increase in orders with the pickup modality.
Adoption of these initiatives as best practices by Nespresso's global management.

responsibilities: Lead the e-commerce strategy for Nespresso.com.
Monitor the purchase process on Nespresso.cl.
Develop online campaigns like Cyber Day and Black Friday.
Improve the SEO positioning of the website.
